      • getVideos

        @RequestMapping(value="/course/{courseId}/lecture/{lectureId}/video",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getVideos(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                             int courseId,
                                                                                                                                                                             @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                             int lectureId)
        Retrieve all videos from a certain lecture or course. If lectureId = 0, the video is course-specific, not lecture-specific.
        Parameters:
        Id - of the course
        Id - of the lecture
        Id - of the video
        Returns:
        Video object
